tryolabs/norfair

Adds tracking capabilities to any object detector

View on index

Related repos

  • Unified library for multi-object tracking algorithms with modular design and easy integration
  • Detects trackers via BLE and WiFi scanning
  • Local surveillance with object detection
  • Open source video surveillance agent for commercial use
  • toolkit for computer vision tasks like detection, tracking, and dataset handling
  • YOLOv5 fast object detection models by Ultralytics
  • tracks any pixel in video with transformer-based model, supports dense and long-term point tracking even through occlusion
  • Self-hosted location tracking app that analyzes your movement patterns and significant places
